entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
